title: Leaver buster Bug
body: I understand the purpose of leaver buster. My power went out due to a storm and I got leaver buster. its fine I have to wait the 20 minutes because my leave had externalities on other players so that is acceptable; however, the Bug I am discussing not only puts my through the 20 minute Queue, but after the 20 minutes has elapsed I am never put into the match making queue. League of legends says I am in queue but I have been in queue for almost an hour. Does this mean I am never allowed to play league again?
